        let obj = {
            name: {
                firstName: 'å°',

            },

        function copyObj(obj) {
            let obj1 = Array.isArray(obj) ? [] : {};
            for (const key in obj) {
                if (typeof obj[key] === 'object') {
                    obj1[key] = copyObj(obj[key]);
                } else {
                    obj1[key] = obj[key]
                }
            }
            return obj1
        }
